articles.description: Martin Truex Jr. has retaken the lead of the NASCAR Cup Series point standings following Monday's rain-postponed Crayon 301 at New Hampshire Motor Spe...
articles.content:
Martin Truex Jr. has retaken the lead of the NASCAR Cup Series point standings following Monday’s rain-postponed Crayon 301 at New Hampshire Motor Speedway.
